title: New technology to be embraced at Old Oak and Park Royal (Greater London Authority)
text: ( Source : Greater London Authority ) The Old Oak and Park Royal Development Corporation (OPDC) has teamed up with an organisation that promotes technological innovation to ensure that all future development at the UK's largest regeneration
